title: Planning a Short Vacation
description: Ryan talks about planning a short vacation to relax.
speaker: Ryan
text: For the past few weeks, I have felt very busy at work and needed a short break.
Last weekend, I started thinking about taking a short vacation to relax.
I talked with my friend about different places we could visit together.
We discussed the cost, the travel time, and the activities we wanted to do.
After the conversation, we agreed on a small beach town near the city.
Next month, we are going to travel there for three days.
We will stay in a small hotel and spend most of our time near the sea.
I believe this vacation will help me return to work with more energy.
